Lots of action for Turkey Day :)

Scans are all ready and will be sent upon request.  

Later this weekend I'll post pics and prices here for those that haven't sold.
email sent on p. clarke portrait

Hi Im interested in the donovan portrait and schmidt. Can you please send scans to [url]ddm4236@comcast.net[/url]
Thanks
Yes, scans being sent, but I'm really not checking the board classifieds often.  I respond much quicker to emails, as they come to my phone.

Thanks for all the interest - it was a fun day!

Whatever hasn't sold by tomorrow evening will head to ebay, where I've also tossed a couple of T200's and other things.

Hi Scott,
E-mail sent with offer and scan request on Clarke and Graham.
Thanks,
--S

Hey Scott:
Email sent on Mullin Throwing

Any of these unsold as of 6:00pm Pacific tonight, will be heading to ebay as $9.99 auctions :)

Thanks for all the interest so far.
All others are either sold or on ebay - thanks!
